website_summaries.verdict: Two-piece swimsuits in a range of styles from a well-known children's clothing brand.
pros: Available in 10 different girly and sporty styles in sizes 2T to 14
The two-piece swimsuit fits well and dries quickly
Holds up well after multiple uses and washes
cons: Some styles run big, while others are true to size

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: We bough this absolutely adorable swimsuit to bring on our vacation in January. This swimsuit is the perfect color and no one else had the same one ;-) Carter's knocks it out the park as usual in quality so no worries there! This fit our tiny 10 month old perfectly and dried quickly between pool dips. I think I may buy it in a larger size so she can wear it over the summer as well!
customer_reviews.author: Bel Jones

customer_reviews.title: A little bit snug but overall great.
customer_reviews.text: So. Stinkin. Cute. I bought the 12M size as my daughter will be 12 months at the end of July. When I tried this on her at 6 months old it was not as roomy as I thought. Granted, she is somewhere are the 90th percentile for her height/weight, but I definitely should have gotten a larger size especially since she’ll need to wear a swim diaper with it. I think it will probably fit her okay since my family’s beach trip is in early summer. And for the price I can’t complain. The colors are more vibrant in person.
customer_reviews.author: Turducken

customer_reviews.title: Bottom is very poorly made. Cute fabric.
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 yo loves this suit.she is almost 30lbs and average height and body. The top of the 4T fits perfectly, the bottom is huge.. it’s big on the waist and HUGE around the legs.. I ordered the 3T and the waist is better but the legs are ridiculous, like shorts around her legs.. I have a Carters suit from 4 years ago that my super slim daughter wore and it has elastic around the legs to keep it tight around the leg. It was such better quality! I’ve attached photos of the aqua 4T from years ago, and the pink 4T bottom for this review.
customer_reviews.author: OliveT

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8 yo. 54lbs and 47” tall. Bought her sz 8. Fits her with a little room to spare. 7 would be too small. Color is exact to what’s in the picture; silver body. Pink trim
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute!!! I wanted a rash guard to provide my baby extra sun protection, while also being a two piece for easy and quick diaper changes. Infant swimsuits all seem to fit small, and this one is no different. I ordered size 12 month for my 5 month old, granted she's in the 90th percentile for nearly everything. Just something to keep in mind. I didn't know this when I ordered, but the fabric has SPF 50. A very nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute swimsuit. It fits great and washes easily. I prefer two piece suits for my daughter because they’re easier for her to put on and take off herself (she’s 4 and likes to be independent, you know how that goes 🤦🏻‍♀️) but traditional two piece tops don’t stay down on her because of the way she’s built. I love that this covers more of her tummy and stays on over her chest plus the unicorns are really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ang D

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE “UNICORN” SWIMSUITS
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice fabric, vibrant colors & fit perfectly. Purchased 4T & 6-6X for my granddaughters, they loved being twin cousins! Unicorns are “so in” right now!
customer_reviews.author: Ann S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little swimming  suit
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like two piece swimming suits for little girls but this one I actually Liked the top was long enough to cover her little tumie the top has a nice spandex to it that it don’t rise up it stays down my four year old granddaughter was so excited to take this on her Disneyland trip
customer_reviews.author: nyman89

customer_reviews.title: Fits large
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit fits large and loose in the bottom And shoulder straps. My daughter is 4.5 and pretty average sized. This would have fallen off if worn swimming. Her whole butt was hanging out. Disappointed. I will keep because she might be able to wear it next year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and appropriate for the age it’s sized for. The bottom is not too skimpy and fits just right. The bottoms are the hardest piece of a tanking to find. I feel a lot are made too skimpy for little kids. The top straps aren’t too tight or too loose.
customer_reviews.author: lmdmusicmaker

customer_reviews.title: Horrible cut and fit. Too large on top
customer_reviews.text: Way off on the sizing and cut on this one. The bottom fits perfectly for my 7 years old but the top was for a 10 years old. I ordered 6-6x for my 20%tile height and 44lbs girl. She moves and you can see her boobies from top and sides it was horrible. Wish it worked out the print is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Bubu

customer_reviews.title: the top fit perfect but the bottoms were too around the waist with ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the flamingo bathing suit in 9 months. My 9 month old is on the petite side and weighs 17 lbs. the top fit perfect but the bottoms were too around the waist with a diaper on. Luckily she has chunky little legs and will keep them up, but definitely runs a little big. Other than that, it’s adorable and I like that it has sleeves for more coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Carters two piece suit !
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute bathing suit. Covers enough without looking like a one piece. Flattering and love the ruffles. My daughter enjoys it a lot. It washes well and doesn’t seem to have faded at all from pool use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute swim suit and fits well. The only problem is it smells really bad. I had seen the reviews about the smell and should have listened. I washed it left it outside for several days and it still smells. I can’t even put in my daughters dresser or it makes the other clothes smell.
customer_reviews.author: BritP

customer_reviews.title: Size on the larger side - so size down
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5 and a half and about 40 pounds. She’s tallish for her age but on the petite side. I ordered a 6x since carters tends to run small but this was quite large. Hopefully she can wear it next summer!
customer_reviews.author: TheatreandFilm

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Super cute suit. My daughter wore it multiple times throughout the summer and it has held up well to chlorine, beach, and the washer & dryer a lot. The fit was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: The suit is very cute but I would say it runs small. My daughter is 15 months/26 lbs/31" tall and we ended up with a 3T we would have even went with a 4T but it wasn't available.
customer_reviews.author: MN Woodworker

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Fits my daughter well and is good carter’s quality. The silver detail is very sparkly and has held up in the wash. I try not to put it in the dryer but did twice on accident. Still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for my unicorn lover! Ran a little big. My daughter is typically 5T, although she’s on the smaller side of that size. She definitely has room to grow in this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L

customer_reviews.title: Adorable girls bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and style, easy to put on and top straps stay where they belong Fits perfectly and looks adorable on
customer_reviews.author: Lori Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: Print and quality is great. The bottoms are a little large. I will he on to it til next summer. Ordered a 3T for my 2 and a half year old. Bottoms too large.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ehret

customer_reviews.title: Fin-tastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Very unique. Our daughter loved the sparkle shiny finish of the fabric. No fade so far. Would recommend this for any mermaid loving girl child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, my grand baby is chunky and it was a little big for her but I will love the butt coverage when she grows into it more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top too big, cheeky bottoms
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this suit. My daughter (5 years old) loves it, but the fit is very strange. She has a build that can normally wear anything without problems, but the top of this suit was super oversized on her. The bottoms mostly fit fine but were fairly “cheeky” on her... odd for a preschooler swimsuit. I expected more from Carter’s.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves wearing this suit
customer_reviews.text: One of the first suits my daughter reaches for in the drawer. Washes well and has kept shape.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and wonderful price
customer_reviews.text: My four-year-old daughter absolutely loves this swimsuit. It fits perfect, true to size. I got this at a great price as well cannot be seven dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey T.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and perfect fit! Purchased 2 for my 2 little girls. I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Size 8 fits my girl perfectly! The cut it adorable! It’s bright and summery! Good quality material too.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Waste too big
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but bottom is too big around waste. Top fits perfect though. The waste has to be tied with a rubberband otherwise it will fall off my daughter. She wears a 3t and we purchased 3t.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Renion

customer_reviews.title: Super cute suit
customer_reviews.text: Came as stated and super cute. My Little one got lots of compliments at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Carswell

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Fit great but Carter’s runs small on my baby so I’d buy a size up for comfort. True to fit but it fit her perfect and she wouldn’t have been able to wear for more than 2 weeks. Will buy again for summer though
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Polanis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mermaids.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color, pretty ruffle detail. The bottoms could fit a child with a larger tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Schnoor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: What a great swimsuit from Carters! Good quality, super cute, and super comfortable for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this swimsuit so much that she now ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this swimsuit so much that she now enjoys her swimming lesson even before it starts because she loves to wear this around the house beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: 997c2s

customer_reviews.title: Adorable suit but baggy top
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is adorable and my daughter loves it. My only complaint is that it’s a little large in busy/strap area. It doesn’t hang too low, but she usually wears a this size in Carter’s clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki T.

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: She loves it and it fits well-not too snug and not too big, with room for some growth. She is tall for her age and the top covers her stomach. Top does lift some when she is active in the water but doesn't ride up.
customer_reviews.author: Bree M.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter wears 12 month clothes. Bought an 18 ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears 12 month clothes. Bought an 18 month it was way too small and rode up on her belly. Got a 24 month instead and we had the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute suit. My daughter loves it and it makes for great beach pictures!
customer_reviews.author: A. Klaw

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 4 year old. She loved this bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Cute swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this swimsuit. She is usually a 4T but I ordered a 3T because she’s tall and skinny and I knew the bottoms would be too loose. The 3T fits her perfect. The top is still long enough to cover her stomach and the bottoms fit good and don’t fall down when she gets out of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: After a week of wear at the beach this suit will be thrown away. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The lining is ripping away from suit after a couple times wearing it. Also, we purchased this suit for the beach. Terrible decision because the lining has little holes that traps sand in between lining and suit.
customer_reviews.author: L/R

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughter perfect who is just reaching 4T clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli L

customer_reviews.title: Adorable set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my granddaughter. It is adorable! It seems well made and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms seemed bigger than the top the top was so tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer!
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Can’t go wrong w pink unicorns, am I right?
customer_reviews.author: Bossy Italian Wife

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2 yrs 4 mo (28 months) and weighs 24lbs. I bought the 24 month swim suit. It fits good and she seems to like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost good enough
customer_reviews.text: Bottom is a little tight and the top is too big. Cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Whytechyck

customer_reviews.title: Cute but painful
customer_reviews.text: Very cute swimsuit but every time my daughter wears it, it rubs her raw due to the material.
customer_reviews.author: Aleacia Apodaca

customer_reviews.title: it's adorable! The fit is just right and the fabric ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my granddaughter, it's adorable! The fit is just right and the fabric is soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ann T

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Great quality, cute design. Seems to run a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: Mscolorade

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not new!
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms came completely stretched out. We made due since it was for a vacation happening fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great swim suit! Fits good for our girl that wears a 6t normally.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Romrell

customer_reviews.title: great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Love this.. bought for my granddaughter who loves mermaids . Looks supercute on her
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTI MCGEE

customer_reviews.title: "Mermaid suit"
customer_reviews.text: This suit is super cute. My daughter calls it her "mermaid suit". It fits as expected and has held up through several washes!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Carters is always true to size for our daughter and this suit was no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl absolutely loved this. She said it is her favorite of all time. Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Made nice. My 3 year old is tall for her age and took a 6
customer_reviews.author: kimp

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small, but SUPER cute!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this swim suit for my daughter! It did run just a bit small, I was glad I got the 7 instead of the 6, but otherwise fit well!
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and my kiddo loves it! Plus easy for her to get on by herself since the straps don’t crisscross .
customer_reviews.author: blueskies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the quality is great and even better it's so cute!!!!!! LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: BostonAnnie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but buy a size up.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old is 80th percentile for height and 50th for weight (50th for head) but the 9 month size was a little small in the head hole but the bottoms are a little big, even with a swim diaper. Overall, stitching and pattern are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: everything looked good, except for a small smudge on the back of the bottoms.
customer_reviews.text: The swim suit looks good, carter's quality. There was a small smudge on the back of the bottoms, maybe from dust or dirt, not sure. I put water on that small part and it looks like it took it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn Quintero

customer_reviews.title: 2t swim suit!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is super cute! Fit a bit snugger than I would have liked on my almost 2 year old, but great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: It is super cute, and her favorite swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Bottoms were a bit large for my daughter but the top fits and we just use different bottoms. It is super cute, and her favorite swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bathing suit!
customer_reviews.text: Great material and my 5 year old daughter loves how it feels. Super shiny too!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This suit is adorable! My daughter normally wears 2-3T but based on other reviews I bought a 4T and I am glad I did. Super cute but runs a tad small.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Such as cute bathing suit. The fit is great for my daughter, she has a long torso. And super easy for trips to the bathroom at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves her swim suit and was very excited to show it all to all her friends in school!
customer_reviews.author: Aislinn

customer_reviews.title: Sizes a little big
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a 6 and sometimes a 7/8 depending on what it is. Was surprised the top on this size 6 is big, almost too big to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Woo

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Cute but too small ordered an 8 for my 7 year old who is 60 lbs and 48 inches. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: megan childers

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Fabric color was prettier in person than in a photo
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Brooke Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Top is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the fabric is great but the top needs to be sewn. It may have been stretched out and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Blair

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It fits perfectly. It's super cute. The colors are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute swimsuit. The fit was great - bottoms were fit perfectly over a swim diaper!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is so pretty! The material is of great quality. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute swimsuit and was a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Great quality.. and just adorable on my 2 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Another great carter’s product
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected for Carter’s bathing suits. If you’re not familiar with how they fit, order a size up for infant bottoms so diaper fits in comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: We got so many compliments on this little swimsuit. This is size 3 months. In this pic, baby is 3 months + 3 weeks old, about 14lbs
customer_reviews.author: Kalilah Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: So cute and shiny
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is really adorable on my 6 year old daughter. She is quite tall and slim (about 45" tall and hard to find a waist that fits) and the size 4/5 fits her perfectly. The bottoms don't fall down and the top is just long enough to touch the top of the bottoms most of the time. I love that it's easy to get on and off when wet because it's a 2-piece and she loves the shiny mermaid scales and the ruffle along the bottoms. Very cute swimsuit!
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little larger than other 6/6x swim suits I’ve purchased but it’s very cute and isn’t so big that it’s falling off her, hoping that means we will get and extra year out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves mermaids, and now she can be one.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Meowgi

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Width fits but straps are a little long same with the bottom, but it works and it's absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Jalela D.

product_meta.title: Carter's Girls' Two-Piece Swimsuit
product_meta.description: 2-piece swim suit with trim, details, and prints. Varied by style.
feature_bullets: Trim, details and print vary by style
